forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Clear, with a low around 54. Northwest wind 3 to 7 mph.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 70. Southwest wind 3 to 12 mph.

weather_report:
As the night stretches across Downtown San Francisco, the atmosphere is serene, cloaked in a gentle clarity that sets a promising tone for the day ahead. With temperatures dipping to a comforting 54 degrees, the allure of cool, crisp air invites a sense of calm. A light breeze whispers through the streets, wrapping around the corners of buildings, as the city settles into its nocturnal rhythm. Though the night sky holds an abundance of stars, shadows linger in the recesses, hinting at the possibility of a playful marine layer just beyond the hills.

As dawn approaches, the sun will awaken the city to a splendid embrace of sunshine, warming the air to a delightful 70 degrees. The clarity of the day will merge with this warmth, creating a backdrop perfect for leisurely strolls along the Embarcadero or a visit to one of the many hidden cafés that dot the downtown area. Dress simply, perhaps in light layers, as the morning chill gives way to midday comfort. With no fog to obscure the vibrant skyline, it's a splendid opportunity to explore or to savor an afternoon spent atop one of the city's scenic vantage points, taking in the beauty of the Golden Gate Bridge jutting gracefully against the horizon. This day promises nothing short of an elegant dance between warmth and coastal charm, an invitation for all to indulge in the everyday wonders of life.
